channel.title: QuickTune
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Updated to display proper names for Apple Música Uno, Apple Music Chill, and Apple Music Club.
  • Fixed an issue where the play/stop glyph wouldn't display properly based on media playback types.

• 7.4,1: Fixed an issue where the Previous/Next buttons would not appear disabled when listening to live radio in Apple Music.
  • 7.4: Updated design for the enabled states for Shuffle and Repeat buttons in the Leopard theme. Thank you Tuomas Hämäläinen.
  • 7.4: When QuickTune is minimized, its Dock tile thumbnail will now refresh to display the current Now Playing track's album cover art. Thank you Steve Troughton-Smith.
  • 7.4: Additional enhancements to reduce the number of UI state refreshes needed to sync UI with Apple Music.

• Updated design for the enabled states for Shuffle and Repeat buttons in the Leopard theme. Thank you Tuomas Hämäläinen.
  • When QuickTune is minimized, its Dock tile thumbnail will now refresh to display the current Now Playing track's album cover art. Thank you Steve Troughton-Smith.
  • Additional enhancements to reduce the number of UI state refreshes needed to sync UI with Apple Music.
